Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Look at the tree there—the one way up
on that hill.

They say folks are lining up to hear those
prophecies every day, hoping to have
their fortunes told.
Talk80: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Where goest thou? Thy trial is not over!
Talk63:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there, fella. So, checking out my
fancy duds, I bet.<sp:5:0:0> Stylish, right?

I'm a little late to fashion and all that,
but my eyes are wide open now.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was heading east for <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>,
since I'd heard celebrity designer Cece
was influenced by someone there.
But when I heard about the oracle here,
I had to stop by and see for myself if
it's the real deal.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And buddy, it's real as can be! Here's the
prophecy I got:<sp:5:0:0> "On a remote island to the
<clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, thou wilt find great fortune."
Tarrey Town will have to wait. I have an
island to go to! I just hope "great fortune"
means a treasure trove of clothes...
Talk64:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I know... <sp:5:0:0>A Cucco spouting <clr:0000>prophecies<clr:ffff>?
Total fluff—it's not why reporters like you
and me got into this game.
Sometimes you have to swallow your pride
and take the byline. And who knows?
Maybe there's a real story buried here.
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Look at you, partner! Coming all
the way out here to track down leads.
You remind me of me.
Talk65:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Not one chirp or warble about our missing
princess, I'm sorry to say.
Talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>I know all.<sp:5:1:0>


And what I know...is that thou wilt face
trials that will reveal much to you.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>So...<sp:5:0:0>will thou take these trials?
Talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>What do they want?! Let's get out
of here!
Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The All-Clucking Cucco said that "great
fortune" is waiting for me on a "remote
island to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>."
As for what that "fortune" looks like,
I can't say... <sp:5:0:0>But it could be clothes!
Or money I can use to buy clothes!
So before I go east to Tarrey Town, I have
to go see it! Who knows? Maybe this'll be
my big break in the world of fashion!
Talk68:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Look at you, partner! Digging around
in the rain, hoping to turn up a lead. You
remind me of me.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluuuck*<sp:5:0:0> I knew thou wouldst say
those words. For I know all that was and
will be.
0004: I want to take a break.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I know what you're thinking—seasoned
reporter like me, hoping to get a lead from
actual poultry?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, hear me out. Those that flock up
there for their fortunes? They might know
the REAL story here. Interview them!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Get to the <clr:0000>top of that stable's head<clr:ffff>
within the time limit.
Talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise>Who are THEY?<sp:5:0:0> I'm going to hightail it
out of here. You should too!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>Good job with that trial. I'd say I'm
impressed, but I already knew that was
going to happen. <sp:5:0:0>So...
Thou, yes, thou! Ready to face the next
trial? Only if thou overcome it...will thou
find what thou seeketh!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>So...<sp:5:1:0>are you going to try it or what?
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Lots of trees around here.<sp:5:0:0> Any of them
will do the job.
Talk51:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>No, it can't be!<sp:5:0:0> The All-Clucking Cucco
was a hoax?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But then, the prophecies... That means
they were all made up.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. What am I gonna do now? I guess
I shouldn't bother checking out that
"remote island to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>"...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then again, who knows... There might be
some truth in it, right?
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Just do whatever it takes to get
them here.

<sp:5:0:0>*cluckity* *cluck* *cluck* Ready yourself.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluuuck* *cluck*<sp:5:0:0> Thou are back,
as I knew you would be. Art thou ready
to take on the trial?
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluuuck*<sp:5:0:0> So! Art thou prepared
to take on the trial?
Talk54:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>How's it going, partner? You pick up
any leads out there? <sp:5:0:0>Because at the
moment, I've got diddly and squat.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK, <clr:0000>bring me three logs<clr:ffff>. And do it
before time runs out.
Talk71:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anyway, get a load of you! Giving us a
big scoop and those Yiga dolts a healthy
clobbering, all in the same day.
Not bad for a day's work! You keep that
up and I'll have no choice but to keep you
on as my partner for a long, long time.
But enough crowing. If I want to meet my
deadline, I'd better get back to the office
and start writing this up.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>See you, kid!
Talk55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If we've got nothing else, we may have to
make a trip to the <clr:0000>All-Clucking Cucco <clr:ffff>at
the tree on the hill.
Talk72:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The All-Clucking Cucco is next to the big
tree behind the stable. You should go!

Whatever in life might be troubling you,
the All-Clucking Cucco can help fix it.
Talk73:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluck* *cluuuck*<sp:5:1:0>


I knew thou would speak to me again... 
for I know all.

What I also know is that thou wilt face
trials that will reveal much to you.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>So...<sp:5:0:0>will thou take these trials?
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>*cluck* *cluck*<sp:5:0:0> Come back if you want to
try this again.
Talk56:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I have so many questions to ask... I need
a bit of time to narrow them down.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>So don't worry about me. You go ahead.
Talk74:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there, fella. So, checking out my
fancy duds, I bet.<sp:5:0:0> Stylish, right?

I'm a little late to fashion and all that,
but my eyes are wide open now.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was heading east for <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>,
since I'd heard celebrity designer Cece
was influenced by someone there.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But the All-Clucking Cucco just reminded
me again that "on a remote island to the
<clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, thou will find great fortune."
So clearly, I've gotta go northeast!
Who knows, right? Maybe I'll find a big
pile of stylish and expensive clothes!
Talk58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you here for a prophecy from the
All-Clucking Cucco?

Get ready for your life to change. They
say the Cucco's words always come true!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Actually, do you want to take my place
in line? I have a lot of questions, and I
need time to sort out which to ask...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Really, you'd be doing me a favor.
Go ahead!
Talk75:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sounds like the All-Clucking Cucco was
a scam, and the prophecy I got was a
load of bunk.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then again... There could be truth in it.
Maybe a higher power is nudging me to
that "remote island to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>."
Talk76:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. Should I really ask about that?
No, maybe not... But then again— <sp:5:0:0>Hm?
Talk59:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So, the All-Clucking Cucco was just one
big hoax...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>On the bright side,<sp:5:1:0> it taught me an
important lesson—<sp:5:0:0>only I can decide what
road to take in life.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, I'm going to start heading
<clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll see you again,
if our paths happen to cross.
Talk77: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting><clr:0000>Bring three logs <clr:ffff>here within the time limit.
Talk78:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rain or shine, <sp:5:0:0>my love for fashion will
carry me through!
Talk79:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I travel a lot, so I'm used to getting
rained on—just not this much. I only hope
I don't catch pneumonia out here.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, how about it? Tell me you've got
something we can work with. <sp:5:0:0>No?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>I've got nothing either. Not a chirp. Not
a warble.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Even if I strain the ol' earholes... No, sir.
Not the slightest peep.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So, what to do when our leads go quiet
and luck runs out? I suppose we've got
one last resort. A <clr:0000>prophecy<clr:ffff>!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Look at you, partner! Up at sunup
scouting out leads. You remind me of me.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluuuck* *cluck*<sp:5:1:0>


Thy name... What is thy name?<sp:5:1:0>
Ah, I sense it. You are...Link.

And you're searching for someone...<sp:5:1:0>
Ah, yes...<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluck* So...<sp:5:1:0>you tired yet or what?
You've GOT to be worn out.

Well, it's been entertaining. So naive.
So trusting.<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe you fell
for this.
<snd:Greeting>A talking Cucco? Ridiculous.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>*cluck* *cluck*<sp:5:0:0> What are you doing? If
you don't hurry, you won't make it.
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now that you're worn out...we've got you
RIGHT where we want you.<sp:5:0:0> Everyone...
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>What's wrong?<sp:5:0:0> Thou won't get any
closer to what thou ultimately seeketh
that way. 
How about it?<sp:5:0:0> Take the trial again?
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Uh-huh...<sp:5:1:0> I see...


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Well, I had a suspicion that a Cucco
couldn't yap to save its life, but I didn't
suspect this was a <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> trap.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Those chumps really knew how to lure us
in by mentioning Princess Zelda. Guess
we walked right into that one.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was just giving a good, long think to the
All-Clucking Cucco situation...<sp:5:0:0>when I saw
everyone running around the tree here.
So, what's the story, kid?
Talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But at least this'll make one heck of a
newspaper story.<sp:5:0:0> All those who put their
faith in that Cucco's prophecies...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>People need to know the truth—or else
they'll fall for more of these lies in the
future. Oracles, my tail feathers!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This time, get to that goal in the time
limit.
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! Look at you, partner! Feeling around
for leads after dark. You remind me of me.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, yes. <sp:5:1:0>It's come to that. Good thing
there's one heck of a <clr:0000>Cucco<clr:ffff> around here.
That, er...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>speaks prophecy<clr:ffff>.
I mean we know it's hard to believe, but
you've got to wonder.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Excuse me. My turn! Please don't cut
in front of others.
